ygData.subject: RE: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: This reminds me, has any level 50 with a Selo s drum tried to outrun shadowmen? I ve been meaning to try, but never think of it when I m in a shadowmen zone.
ygData.messageBody:
This reminds me, has any level 50 with a Selo's drum tried to outrun
shadowmen?
I've been meaning to try, but never think of it when I'm in a shadowmen
zone. It seemed like it was a close race with a MM drum, but I'm wondering
if the Selo's drum can restore our title of "fastest thing in norrath"


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 11:38 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
<snip>

[connecting to shadowmen thread] This is how a bard can outrun
shadowmen. Selo's + Screech. The shadowmen move so fast in the
opposite direction that they are out of agro radius within about
2 seconds and give up the chase. So if someone asks you if you
can outrun shadowmen, you can if you are creative. Just twist
Selos and Screech and take off.

Harmonic.
